newsitem.title: JAPAN: Honda gets 30,000 orders for Life in first month.
newsitem.headline: Honda gets 30,000 orders for Life in first month.

text.p: Honda Motor Co Ltd said on Thursday that it had received about 30,000 orders for its new minivehicle model "Life" in its first month of sales.
The original monthly sales target for the model was 8,000.
The Life 660cc multi-purpose minivehicle, unveiled on April 18, was Honda's first new minivehicle in four years.
Honda said at the time of the launch that it aimed to grab a larger share of Japan's small car sector.
Life sells in Japan for a minimum price of 898,000 yen.
